borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="line-height: 115%; font-size: 14px;">a. Prior to commencement of the development, a Construction Logistics Plan (CLP) Pro Forma must be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The details shall include:&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">the numbers, size and routes of construction vehicles, provisions within/around the site to ensure that all vehicles associated with the construction works are properly managed to prevent any unwanted disruption to other highway users, and other matters relating to traffic management to be agreed with the licencing officers of the council. </span></p><p><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">b. Approved details under part (a) shall be implemented throughout the project period and any changes to the document must be reported back to the councilâ€™s planning and highways department.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt">Within 1 month of this permission being granted,&nbsp;the cycle parking as shown on drawing number 1105 -NLA-A1-ZZ-DR-A-00009&nbsp;Rev A shall be installed in full and&nbsp;be permanently retained thereafter.</span></p>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">a. Prior to the first occupation of the approved development, the development must achieve a Certificate of Compliance in respect of the Secured by Design scheme, or alternatively achieve security standards (based on Secured by Design principles) to the satisfaction of the local authority &amp; Metropolitan Police, details of which shall be provided to the Local Planning Authority for its written approval . </span></span><br></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">b. All security measures applied to the approved development shall be permanently retained thereafter.&nbsp;</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size: 11pt;">The development&nbsp; hereby permitted shall </span><span style="font-size: 14.6667px;">operate</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">&nbsp;in accordance&nbsp;with the&nbsp;objectives and targets of the submitted Travel Plan, prepared by ICENI, dated March 2023.&nbsp;</span></p><p><br></p>

<p>The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><ul><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">1105&nbsp;-CYA-A1-ZZ-DR-A-00001&nbsp;Rev A - Site Location &amp; Block Plans - Jan 23</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">1105&nbsp;-CYA-A1-ZZ-DR-A-00005&nbsp;Rev B&nbsp;-&nbsp;Ground &amp; 1st Floor Plans-As Proposed - Jan 23</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">1105&nbsp;-CYA-A1-ZZ-DR-A-00006&nbsp;Rev A - 2nd Floor &amp; Roof Plan-As Proposed - Jan 23</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">1105&nbsp;-CYA-A1-ZZ-DR-A-00007&nbsp;Rev A - Front &amp; Side elevations &amp; Section-As Proposed - Jan 23</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">1105&nbsp;-CYA-A1-ZZ-DR-A-00008&nbsp;Rev A - Rear Elevation-As Proposed - Jan 23</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">1105&nbsp;-NLA-A1-ZZ-DR-A-00009 Rev A -&nbsp;Cycle Parking Details - March 23</span></span></li></ul><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>
description: Construction of a three storey side extension including an additional second storey to the existing building to provide storage, workshop and garage space

constraints_details.result: Stephen Markham Collection, Unit 4, Dominion Works Freshwater Road, Dagenham, Barking And Dagenham, RM8 1RX
